block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$669,500 347 West 39th Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,350-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; high ceilings, 3 walls of windows, slate floors, washer/dryer, Hudson River view; maintenance $1,310, 60% tax-deductible; listed at $695,000, 6 weeks on market (Brokers: Silverman Group; Bellmarc)

$399,000 120 Cabrini Boulevard (Castle Village) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,250-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; part-time doormen, dining room, windowed kitchen, 3 exposures, Hudson River view; maintenance $1,018, includes utilities, 42% tax-deductible; listed at $399,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Stein Perry)

$2.5 million 524 East 72nd Street 2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 2,300-sq.-ft. penthouse condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining room, renovated kitchen and baths, fireplace, 385-sq.-ft. terrace, East River view, health club in building; common charge $2,089; taxes $15,000; listed at $2.55 million, 9 weeks on market (Brokers: Halstead Property Co.; Corcoran Group)

$1.8 million 150 Columbus Avenue (1 Lincoln Square) 3-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 2,050-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, h/w floors, dining area; common charge $1,062; taxes $6,000; listed at $1.89 million, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman)

$120,000 3135 Johnson Avenue (Edmond Lee) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, h/w floors, terrace, 2 exposures; maintenance $603, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $125,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Susan E. Goldy)

$276,000 9420 Wogan Terrace 4-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath prewar Tudor; dining room, breakfast room, h/w floors, terrace, 14-by-87-ft. lot; taxes $1,910; listed at $275,000 (multiple bids), 1 week on market (Broker: Velsor)

$375,000 525 Fifth Street 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a limestone building; dining room, high ceilings, h/w floors, original moldings and detail, common roof deck; maintenance $455, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $375,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Garfield)

$277,000 932 55th Street 64-year-old, 2-family brick house; 3 bedrooms in primary unit, 1 bedroom in other; 1 bath, h/w floors in each; 20-by-67-ft. lot; taxes $1,679; listed at $265,000 (multiple bids), 2 weeks on market (Broker: Velsor)

$352,000 68-17 Ingram Street 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 50-year-old attached Tudor; dining room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, finished basement, 1-car garage, 19-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,900; listed at $369,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Kingdom)

$259,800 187-30 87th Road 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 70-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, new windows, semifinished basement, 1-car garage, 25-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,458; listed at $259,800, 1 week on market (Broker: Remax/ Millennium)

$260,000 98-25 67th Street 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 60-year-old semiattached town house; dining room, living room, h/w floors, 1-car garage, 21-by-77-ft. lot; taxes $1,750; listed at $299,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Goller & Costi)

$322,500 54 Valencia Avenue 4-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 65-year-old Tudor; dining room, breakfast room, fireplace, finished basement, 1-car garage, 40-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,742; listed at $342,500, 13 weeks on market (Broker: Kingsley)

$355,000 75 Lyons Road 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 50-year-old Cape Cod; entry hall, fireplace, dining room, modern eat-in kitchen, porch, playroom, storage room, detached one-car garage; 0.11-acre lot; taxes $8,653; listed at $379,000, 15 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Ragette)

$1.3 million Dows Lane 5-bedroom, 5 1/2-bath, 140-year-old carriage house; country kitchen, wood-burning stove, powder room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, guest quarters over 3-car garage; 0.43-acre lot; taxes $10,702; listed at $1.35 million, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Houlihan/Lawrence)

$835,000 121 Corlies Avenue 6-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 97-year-old colonial; foyer, fireplace, sun room, den, dining room, modern eat-in kitchen, 34-foot deck, powder room, attached 2-car garage; 0.4-acre lot; taxes $16,685; listed at $820,000 (multiple bids), 2 weeks on market (Broker: McClellan & Co.)

$77,500 108 Sagamore Road 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 875-sq.-ft., 29-year-old co-op; entrance hall, dining area, terrace, attached garage; monthly maintenance $665, 65% tax deductible; listed at $87,000, 12 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Ragette)

$335,000 136 Kissam Lane 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 40-year-old colonial; dining room, family room, fireplace, 1-car attached garage, 1/4-acre lot; taxes $4,500; listed at $349,000, 17 weeks on market (Brokers: Daniel Gale; Harmonious Homes)
$185,000 30 Radial Avenue, 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 52-year-old ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, 1-car garage, 88-by-107-ft. lot; taxes $4,700; listed at $189,999, 7 weeks on market (Broker: Manor Gate)

$745,000 79 Longview Road, 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 65-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, 95-by-130-ft. lot; taxes $11,500; listed at $799,000, 6 weeks on market (Brokers: Goodstein Harbor Town; Douglas Elliman-Town & Country)

$610,000 23 Dandy Drive 5-bedroom, 2-bath, 43-year-old raised ranch; dining room, den, family room, eat-in kitchen, fireplaces, rear deck, 2-car garage, 0.28-acre lot; taxes $4,630; listed at $625,000, 15 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker/Greenwich; William Pitt)

$243,000 4 Coopers Lane 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 22-year-old colonial; dining room, family room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, 2-car garage, 1.12-acre lot; taxes $3,117; listed at $246,900, 7 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut)

$210,000 16-A Algonquin Lane (Oronogue) 2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,360-sq.-ft. furnished 29-year-old condo; eat-in kitchen, full basement, rear deck with awning, golf course view, 1-car garage; common charge $195; taxes $1,872; listed at $210,000, 28 weeks on market (Brokers: William Pitt; William Raveis)

$189,900 339 Skyline Lakes Drive 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 45-year-old ranch; family room in finished basement, deck, 2-car garage, 51-by-116-ft. lakefront lot; taxes $4,664; listed at $189,900, 4 weeks on market (Brokers: Atlantic Real Estate/Better Homes and Gardens; Coldwell Banker)

$564,000 49 Winthrop Road 3-bedroom, 3-bath, 32-year-old ranch; Florida room, family room, 2 decks, in-ground pool, 2-car garage, 115-by-200-ft. lot; taxes $11,072; listed at $599,000, 6 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential New Jersey)

$272,000 900 Queen Anne Road 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 60-year-old Tudor; living room with fireplace, family room, h/w floors, 1-car garage, 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $6,905; listed at $284,900, 8 weeks on market (Brokers: Realtyline; Atlantic Real Estate/Better Homes and Gardens)
$455,000 41 Pascack Road 4-bedroom, 3-bath, 40-year-old contemporary; eat-in kitchen, deck, 3-car garage, 1.9-acre lot; taxes $8,600; listed at $479,000, 5 months on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker)
